biotools.summary: BHi-Cect aims to find preferentially self-interacting chromosome clusters using Hi-C data. It only assumes that chromosome architecture consists of a nested hierarchy where we expect to find smaller-sized clusters nested within larger-sized clusters.

bioschemas.name: BHi-Cect
bioschemas.summary: BHi-Cect aims to find preferentially self-interacting chromosome clusters using Hi-C data. It only assumes that chromosome architecture consists of a nested hierarchy where we expect to find smaller-sized clusters nested within larger-sized clusters.
